entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is late for a hearing.

entities.name: dumbledore's pensieve
entities.description: A place where memories are stored and can be accessed.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison for wizards and witches.

entities.name: lestranges
entities.description: The people who were sentenced to life imprisonment in Azkaban.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: A group of wizards and witches that govern the magical community.

relationships.description: Harry has visited Dumbledore's Pensieve before.
Harry watched the Lestranges being sentenced to life imprisonment in Azkaban from inside Dumbledore's Pensieve.
The Wizengamot sent a notification to Harry about the hearing.
Harry is related to the Lestranges, as he watched them being sentenced in Azkaban.
